example.text: The Biden admin is preparing to drop off tens of thousands of illegal immigrants at bus stops, gas stations, and supermarket parking lots to avoid bad optics of a crowded border… Coming to a neighborhood near you… [[url]]

I hope the Senate moves quickly to send my bipartisan and commonsense legislation to the president's desk. Congress must ensure that every veteran receives the educational assistance and benefits they were promised and earned.

I will fight to reinstate the roughly 6,000 soldiers who were fired and I will do everything I can to provide financial compensation to the 60,000 servicemembers who saw their benefits slashed. As the only Hoosier member of the Armed Services Committee in the House or Senate, I am proud of the legislative wins I was able to secure for our state including: Language that will retire 21 A-10 aircrafts at the Fort Wayne Air National Guard Base, paving the way for the 122nd Fighter Wing to become a hub for F-16 move will benefit thousands of Hoosiers, spur significant economic growth in our state, and help prepare our nation for any battle we may face.

The Biden admin is preparing to drop off tens of thousands of illegal immigrants at bus stops, gas stations, and supermarket parking lots to avoid bad optics of a crowded border… Coming to a neighborhood near you… [[url]]

I recently introduced legislation to remove export control authority from the Bureau of Industry and Security (BIS), which currently handles export control under the Department of Commerce, and move it to the Defense Technology and Security Administration (DTSA) at the Department of Defense (DOD). Click here to learn more.
